job_name: 技術支援類: DFT Sr. RD Solution Engineer (熟悉Scan/MBIST Diagnostics, silicon debug, yield ramping)
cust_name: Synopsys Taiwan Co., Ltd._台灣新思科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
As a Design-For-Test Solutions Engineer, you will be working in a project-oriented environment to deliver DFT Solutions ranging from defining, automating & integration of test products to supporting Bring-Up on Customer designs. It also includes interacting with the customers to assess their methodologies and flows, gather requirements and propose solutions. The primary focus area (but not limited to) for the DFT Solutions Engineer would be SLM (Silicon Life Cycle Management) Products.
 
Key Qualification
•	BE+5 years of relevant experience in Electrical Engineering or Computer Engineering or other relevant field of study
•	Experience with Scan/MBIST Diagnostics & Silicon Bring up
•	Expertise in handling silicon debug, yield ramping, yield management, etc.  
•	Good understanding of ATPG, MBIST, 1500, 1687, LBIST
•	Excellent communication and presentations skills are mandatory. Listening, understanding, and interpreting the customer requirements are a key part of the communications skill set. Good technical problem-solving skills are a must

Preferred Experience   
•Plans and implements Synopsys Test and Diagnostics tool flows to meet test requirements for Automotive, High volume manufacturing etc. that includes SLM IPs, Memory BIST, Logic BIST, Scan compression, Boundary scan, 1687, 1838 etc.
•Creates Specification and Implementation plans using Industry Standard Synopsys Test and Diagnostics tools – TestMAX and develop methodologies for SoC design
•Participates in Flow Automation to enable seamless integration of cutting-edge test and diagnostics technologies into Synopsys Test tools & Platforms
•Participates in Development of Reference Flows for our renowned test and diagnostics solutions
•Participation in customer’s design and flow reviews
Generates high resolution diagnosing patterns and assist in Diagnosis and debug on ATE and In-System testing

job_name: 技術支援類: Analog Mixed-Signal Solutions Engineer
cust_name: Synopsys Taiwan Co., Ltd._台灣新思科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
As an Analog Mixed-Signal Solutions Engineer, you will enable customer flows and deploy analog simulation solutions for key customers. You will collaborate with  developer and field application engineering teams to define and drive the product direction by identifying designer needs and specifying tool capabilities for the next generation designs.  You will work closely with customers to solve complex technical challenges for analog and RF designs and methodologies through the following activities:
•	Engagements: Support customers during the benchmark, suggest right flow solutions to analog & RF customers. 
•	Leverage: Driving product improvements by providing customer input to Synopsys R&D and product groups.
•	Training : Participate in customer & field training , prepare flow collaterals for these training purposes.
 
The job will provide excellent opportunity to solidify technical expertise on analog simulation platform and also for soft skillset growth in customer relationship management.
 
Job Requirements:
•	Masters in EE/CS with 7 years (or a Bachelors in EE/CS with 10+ years) of relevant experience as a Circuit Designer or CAD engineer working as part of a Custom IC Design team. 
•	Knowledge of the complete SPICE, and RF simulation tools are required. 
•	Knowledge of simulation environment and different advanced flow methodologies are required. 
•	Knowledge of scripting skills (TCL, Perl, Python) are required.
•	Strong inter-personal, verbal and written communication skills.
•	Passion for resolving engineering problems.

The job will provide excellent opportunity to solidify technical expertise on analog simulation platform and also for soft skillset growth in customer relationship management.

cust_name: 格路科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【能力需求】
- 學經歷不限
- 曾經學習過一項程式語言
- 喜愛學習
- 容易溝通

【徵才說明】
格路科技是一家承接各式軟體專案的公司，承接的專案大多以製造業相關應用為主，其中包括工廠物(機)聯網軟體開發、機器視覺軟體開發，以及其它自動化與智慧化軟體開發，我們的客戶涵蓋傳統製造業如金屬加工、塑膠、紡織等，也包含電子與半導體等科技產業，應用範圍相當廣泛，工作內容也相當有趣與具有挑戰。

我們是一群喜愛程式開發的工程師組成的團隊，軟體除了是我們解決問題的工具，也是我們解決問題的思維模式，軟體思維具有彈性、延展性、高効、敏捷與不受限等特點，我們遵循良好的原則，但是不受限於制式的工作模式。
總之，我們喜歡高效的工作方式、熱衷解決客戶的問題、學習好的方法、修正不好的地方。

做為一個軟體人，持續學習是必要的，也是最重要的，畢竟我們不希望撰寫重複的程式碼，也不希望把時間浪費在重複性與一成不變的的工作上，因此我們每一次面對的都是新的問題，所以我們希望您是一位喜歡學習的人，您不需要是成績卓越的學霸，也不需要有一目十行或過目不忘的能力，只要您相信能夠透過學習改變或提升自己，並且願意身體力行。

我們也希望您是一位容易溝通的人，所謂容易溝通是願意傾聽與理解別人的意見，然後回饋自己的意見給對方，這樣就能達到良性的溝通循環，我們需要靠良好的溝通保持團隊的流暢運作，良好的溝通也可以讓我們更專注於解決問題的本質上，而不是彼此浪費時間在無益的事物上。

只要您具備喜歡學習與容易溝通的特質，您不必擔心在專業上會有無法勝任的問題，我們的團隊同仁會給予您必要的協助與指引，我們也會盡可能給予您學習專業知識的意見與培訓，我們會同時給您魚竿也教您釣魚，這是我們應該負起的責任，您不用擔心。

希望您勇於嘗試與我們進一步聯繫，也許您會喜歡我們並且是我們要找的夥伴，即便彼此不適合，也沒什麼損失不是嗎？

【工作內容】
- C#程式語言開發 Windows Desktop App / Asp.Net Web App
- SQL資料庫
- 自動化元件控制
- 智慧工廠機聯網應用與開發
- 機器視覺應用與開發

【公司福利】
- 保障年薪14個月
- 就職滿一年另依公司業績加發年終獎金
- 配備外接雙螢幕與商用筆電
- 彈性上下班、週六不補班
- 給予優良與健康的工作環境是公司的責任
- 參加國內技術 Conference 全額補助
- 不定期參加訓練課程全額補助

【薪資範圍】
- 無經驗：30,000 ~ 34,000
- 具備1~2年程式開發經驗：36,000 ~ 42,000
- 具備3年以上程式開發經驗：45,000 ~ 80,000
skill: 軟體程式設計
other: 曾經學習過一項程式語言

cust_name: 飛峰國際股份有限公司
job_detail:
【工作內容】
此工作為每日理貨與進出貨
1. 負責進貨清點、庫存、零件備料管理
2. 單據確認、核對
3. 盤點作業
4. 視業務需求偶爾配合工程師外出
5.主管交辦事項

【公司正職員工福利和規劃】
1.享有勞保、健保、團體意外保險 
2.提供年終獎金、端午獎金、中秋獎金 
3.全勤提供全勤獎金 
4.提供生日禮金、結婚禮金、彌月禮金 
5.公司不定期享有下午茶點心 
6.福委會不定期舉辦聚餐 
7.公司不定期舉辦國內外員工旅遊 
8.定期提供員工一般健康檢查 
9.公司定期提供產品/電機與電子相關教育訓練課程

【管理責任】
出差外派：無需出差外派
上班時段：日班，週一到週五，8：45～18：05，彈性上下班時間15分鐘
休假制度：週休二日
請假制度：請假制度比照勞基法規定
加班制度：加班費制度優於勞基法規定

熱情地邀請您加入我們一員：
近年台電供電越發不穩定，不斷電系統的產業也因此受益及被重視，市場各行各業的需求量及業績的發展可以說是這一波疫情下不僅不受影響，還再次突破成長，更深深讓我們感受男怕入錯行，女怕嫁錯郎的意義。

選對產業，可以讓您的工作事業隨著產業一起前進！如果您很重視公司穩定度、收入穩定中可以成長，人生可以工作與生活共同擁有（相對平衡），那麼，歡迎您來找我們成為我們的夥伴！

關於我們：
於1993年成立至今已二十九餘年，飛峰國際旗下品牌「飛碟UPS」為台灣自有品牌，提供不斷電系統與穩壓器產品銷售與服務。
我們與全球前20大醫療設備品牌合作已達15餘年以上，全台知名醫院（台大、長庚、榮總、慈濟等）佔有率85％，為醫療界第一品牌。並同時為國內軍規唯一認證合格廠商，近年更應用於台灣知名大型公共工程，如高鐵、捷運、機場、台鐵，台北101、半導體科技、電子廠等。並於2012獲得儀器精品特優等獎！目前國內共設立五處原廠服務據點（台北、新竹、台中、台南、高雄）。

公司文化：
飛碟UPS是一個年輕化的品牌，相對的我們從事整個品牌的業務推廣、行銷活動、技術服務等，都是快速、有彈性、熱情活潑的。公司的期許以及全體人員的工作態度和效率都是快節奏、可變化、具彈性的，以達到各地目標為首要，如果您喜歡這樣的工作環境與狀態很值得一試！

公司福利與制度完全依照勞基法，不會剝削員工，勞退薪資等皆按照實際狀況，三節提供禮金，不定時有國內外旅遊等，公司員工流動率低，公司已連續多年，每年皆成長約20%，目前徵才皆是因為擴大營業與業務發展需求，這是一個只要您有能力願意做就有升遷發展的機會，歡迎您來與我們一同努力期待未來。

job_detail:
Job Description
- To implement assessment on sensor application/performance, product mechanical design approach, detail design recommendation by simulation and structure modeling
-To analyze sensor application issue, create the report, find out the root cause, and provide practical improvement plan, failure analysis result and report relate to materials and process independently 
- To debug and troubleshoot design problems by simulations
- To build sensor application/design guideline for customers by simulations
- Basic SW skill and numerical analysis required (like python, jump, or Matlab)

Key Requirements
- Master's degree or above in science or technical discipline with at least three years in a laboratory
-  Highly proficient with FEA for stress and thermal analysis, ideally using ABAQUS, 3D Experience, and COMSOL, and familiar with associated meshing tools and CAD fix software like Hypermesh. Knowledgeable in materials, part manufacturing, and inspection processes are plus
- Familiar with manufacturing processes not limited to - adhesive bonding, lamination process, assembly, plastic injection molding, sheet metal forming and welding, die casting, CNC machining, complex assembly & testing, surface finishing for both plastic and metal.
- Must be effectively bilingual in Mandarin and English; Excellent communication skills with spoken and written English. Others are a plus.
- Positive attitude and great patience

cust_name: 力特康可電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
The Sr. Package Design R&D Engineer will be a key member of the core discrete and IC packaging Research and Development team with responsibilities including design, research, prototyping, engineering documentation, and process improvement for a wide range of silicon and wide-band gap device technologies. The position requires an individual who is innovative, creative, driven, and works well within a team.


About the Job:

- Discrete & IC device packaging design including co-development with subcontract assembly and tooling suppliers using state-of-the-art CAD tools in support of new product development and manufacturing transfer programs.
- Conduct and approve device packaging proposals, designs, process flows, technical specifications, reliability requirements, data collection and analysis.
- Lead new materials selection and development including molding compounds, die attach adhesives/solders and interconnect materials.
- Protect IP through disclosures, patent applications, defensive publications and similar activities.
- Demonstrate expertise and act as local expert in packaging materials, structures and assembly processes as well as reliability and qualification methodologies.
- Work with and mentor other R&D engineers & supporting groups to ensure ongoing and timely New Product Introduction.

About You:

- Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering (Electrical, Mechanical or Microelectronic preferred) from an accredited university or equivalent education/experience. Course work in semiconductors or electronics desirable.
- Strong sense of urgency and accustomed to working on tight deadlines and handling multiple priorities.
- Ability to organize information and data with clarity to draw engineering conclusion and decisions
- Ability to work independently and work with multi-functional teams.
- Strong interpersonal, leadership and communication skills
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /精通、寫 /精通

cust_name: 力特康可電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
Reporting to SBU New Product and Outsourced Quality Director, you as a Quality Manager will be responsible leading a team to manage and maintaining the outsourced suppliers’ quality.  Form and maintain positive relationships with outsourced suppliers.  Owned quality related KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) and leading the creation and execution of the outsourced quality strategic action plan

About the job:
•	Lead the quality effort for outsourced supplier development and continuous improvements activities targeted at achieving Littelfuse and customers quality standard and expectation as well as business needs
•	Communicate with outsourced suppliers on a regular basis in order to address any concerns and foster and zero defects environment focused on continuous improvement
•	Proactively monitor and analyze outsourced supplier quality performance
•	Incorporate PPAP/APQP and Lean Six Sigma concepts for outsourced supplier improvement of quality and delivery metrics
•	Design quality processes and procedures in support of outsourced quality organization
•	Collaborate with outsourced suppliers to develop and implement standards and methods
•	Drive for zero defects mindset
•	Facility continuous improvement projects with outsourced suppliers
•	Train and develop outsourced quality team members
•	Act as interface for quality topics to support outsources
•	Conduct regular and necessary visits, audits, manage meetings at outsources
•	Review process/package development and change management results and support risk assessment
•	Drive best practice sharing and benchmarking activities among outsources


About you:
•	Semiconductor Technology, Microelectronics, Electronic, Automation, Mechanical, Electrical degree holder is a highly preferred
•	8+ total years in Quality, Process, Manufacturing (foundry/assembly/electrical test), or Engineering function
•	Strong communication and management skills
•	Knowledge on semiconductor foundry technology, assembly process and production, final test process and product engineering know-how
•	Strong understanding of quality requirements such as 8D, material review board process, quality planning, qualification release criteria, change management, good understanding on operation/ planning/ logistics
•	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
•	In-depth knowledge of quality tools including cause-and-effect diagram, check sheet, control chart, histogram, Pareto chart, scatter diagram, affinity diagram, tree diagram, control plan, and failure modes-and-effects analysis
•	In-depth knowledge on ISO9000 / IATF16949 / VDA, automotive experience and exposure is added advantage.  Lead Auditor certification is highly desirable
•	Proficient in MS Office suite
•	Able to interface effectively with associates and outsources at all levels of the organization
•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills, able to provide quality interface at any level
•	Previous experience with multinational corporations is an advantage
•	Good understanding of and able to communicate in English.  Knowledge in other language is an advantage
•	Team oriented, responsive, ability to drive change and be able to work under high pressure
•	Ability to work in multi-cultural environment with different time zones
•	Willing to travel extensively

job_name: Sr. New Process / Technology development Engineer
cust_name: 力特康可電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
Job Summary
Littelfuse, a leader in ESD semiconductor products is looking to add a senior engineer to its R&D and technology development team in the design center in Chupei, Taiwan. 
The successful candidate will be part of the diode array technology development team.

Job Description
PRINCIPAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
•	New product development with focus on new process development and process integration.
•	Expertise on state-of-the-art process technologies. Suggest and explore process improvements and additions to existing capabilities.
•	Design of experiments in LF Wafer Fabs as well as with external sources (foundries, equipment suppliers or research institutions) in team with chip designers.
•	New product and process implementation in cooperation with Operations’ process engineering team to ensure manufacturability, cost efficiency and high yield of new designs.
•	Primary focus on ESD and surge suppression devices to be used in state-of-the-art assembly packaging
•	Assist product and process engineering with R&D expertise on yield, cost-down and failure analysis topics
ESSENTIAL JOB REQUIREMENTS:
•	Technical degree in semiconductor device physics or equivalent
•	TCAD or other device simulation experience
•	Good understanding of bipolar Semiconductor Physics and Devices.
•	Excellent understanding and experience in low voltage semiconductor processing ideally with experience in Wafer Fab process engineering and/or process integration
•	Written and oral communication skills in English
•	Problem solving ability
•	Ideally experience in Lean Six Sigma and Lean Development.
ATTRIBUTES:
•	Good team player
•	Good communication skills in R&D as well as production environment in internationally working teams
•	Innovative thinking
•	Hands-on problem-solving attitude
•	High motivation to get things done
•	Good lateral thinking ability to resolve design and process problems
•	Ability and aptitude to undergo training
•	Readiness for travelling

job_name: eCommerce Content & SEO Specialist 行銷專員 (Hsinchu/Taipei)
cust_name: 愛瑪麗歐股份有限公司
job_detail:
As an eCommerce Content & SEO Specialist, you will be responsible for leading all aspects of web marketing/E-commerce from the strategy to the day-to-day operations across awareness, consideration, and conversion. Leadership, initiative, energy, and the ability to work across functions are critical to success.

Job Description:
- Stay abreast of emerging e-commerce trends, identify and manage brand exposure opportunities and bring fresh, creative thinking to leverage growth tactics in the most surprising and effective ways.
- Analyzing data on site traffic, order volume, conversions, visitor behavior, etc.
- Monitoring user engagement levels and efforts that drive new business
- Manage Amaryllo's e-commerce site (www.amaryllo.us) and product listings on Amazon platforms.
- Develop content to include keywords or phrases in order to increase traffic to website and perform ongoing keyword research and discovery, expansion and optimization.
- Initiate testing plans to continuously improve our e-commerce onsite performance
- Conduct regular audits to ensure existing brand, category and product pages maintain accuracy.
- Create optimization plans to increase product ranking and manage through resolution

Skills:
- Strong analytical and creative problem-solving skills.
- Proficient with web analytical tools, including but not limited to: Google Analytics and Google Ad.
- Exceptional verbal, written, interpersonal and communication skills, must be approachable, positive and flexible.
- Excellent time management and organizational skills within a deadline oriented environment
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等

4. 須具備電子產品規格定義的背景(熟監視器&半導體製造成本尤佳)。
